snippet.title: Tiny Thor (Asylum Square) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Unleash the bouncy power of Mjölnir in this retro platformer. Use the mighty hammer and many other power-ups to travel the realms of Asgard. But watch out! Some mythical creatures will do everything to stop Thor from growing up.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/541310/Tiny_Thor/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
